title: A curious treatise of the nature and quality of chocolate. VVritten in Spanish by Antonio Colmenero, doctor in physicke and chirurgery. And put into English by Don Diego de Vades-forte
author: Colmenero de Ledesma, Antonio.
publisher: By I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholomewes,
notes: Don Diego de Vades-forte = James Wadsworth.
A translation of: Curioso tratado de la naturaleza y calidad del chocolate.
Running title reads: A curious treatise of chocolate.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
